entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
